title: [Kobold Village, Squirrel Hutch]
description: Gnawed bones and other more obscene carrion weave a grisly carpet here, a tapestry depicting carnage more vivid than the most gifted and demented of mortal artists might dare.  You struggle to hold down your latest meal as you note a familiar looking skull nearby.  What fate could be worse than to spend eternity between the razor sharp teeth of diseased rodents?
